summary: "Final Destination" is a 2000 horror movie about a teen who survives a plane crash after having a bad dream. He and some classmates leave the plane before it explodes, but Death comes after them later. It's the first movie in a popular series. The idea started as a TV show script, but a movie studio liked it and turned it into a film. It made a lot of money, even though critics didn't like it much. The movie won some awards and led to more "Final Destination" movies and books.
title: Final Destination (film)
